hero.title: Welcome
hero.content: There's two great hobbies in my life: lifeguarding and software engineering. I've even managed to make the latter my work. In this small sites you'll find presentations on both subjects.

introduction.title: Introduction & the Dutch Lifesaving Federation
introduction.content: Welcome to the theory classes. Check this section for the schedules and in introduction to the lifeguard associations.

safety.title: Swimming skill, safety awareness and self-rescue
safety.content: In this section we look into the importance of self-rescue and swimming skills. Besides that we'll have a look at safety awareness and the risks of swimming.

skills.title: Knowledge and skills
skills.content: This sections focuses on different types of rescue, recognizing a person in distress and rendering first aid.

aid.title: The course of a rescue
aid.content: The last section takes you trough the course of a rescue and what your role as a lifesaver could be.

trainings.title: Lifesaving Training
trainings.intro: Goals is to increase self-rescue abilities and basic rescue techniques in a sportive manner. Lifesavers can rescue themselves and others.
trainings.selfRescue: After first swimming certificates increase self-rescue ability in a playful manner.
trainings.rescue: Learning the basics of a rescue where safety of the rescuers is a key element.
trainings.lifesaving: A lifesaver learns some first aid and works further to become a skilled rescuer. Has the ability to rescue themselves and others when passing an emergency situation.

lifeguard.title: Lifeguard Trainings
lifeguard.intro: Goal is to train professional lifeguards for operations at events and locations like open water and beach.

lifesaver.title: The roles and responsibilities of a lifesaver
What is a lifesaver?
lifesaver.preparation: Preparation for lifesaving sport or lifeguarding
lifesaver.emergencies: Can perform a rescue in case of an emergency with rescue or helping materials that are for hand.
lifesaver.renderAid: Render aid when passing accidents during e.g. ice skating, a walk or car accidents
lifesaver.physical: Enough physical endurance for a rescue
lifesaver.knowledge: Enough knowledge of currents, biological hazards and other dangers to pull off a safe rescue.
